commit.message:
re PR target/44942 (Bug in argument passing of long double)

	PR target/44942
	* config/sparc/sparc.c (function_arg_advance): Always take into account
	the padding, if any.

From-SVN: r162967

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@

+
+	PR target/44942
+	* config/sparc/sparc.c (function_arg_advance): Always take into account
+	the padding, if any.
